amathi badiyudin ha aandukarawarun wana asad sali, hisbulla yana aya sambandhayen ella wana chodana wibhaga kirimata janadhipathi komisamak path kara owun dhurawalin iwath karannayi illamin rathana himiyan mema upawasaya aarambha kara atha badurdinta - hisbullata wiruddhawa udghoshanayak rishad badiyudin, asad sali, hisbulla saha mujibar rahuman yana aya thanathuruwalin iwath karana lesa illamin janadhipathiwarayata sandeshayak baradima sandaha ‘surakimu shri lanka‘ sanwidhanaya kolambaa wiharamahadewi udyanaye budupilimaya asalin pa gamanak aarambha wiya wiyalendran rathana himige upawasayata sahaya palakarayi amathya rishad badiyudin saha aandukarawarun dedeneku dhurayen iwath kirima athulu illim 4kata balakaramin pujya athuraliye rathana himiyan wisin aarambha kala upawasayata sahaya palakaramin madakalapuwa disthrik parlimenthu manthri es.wiyalendran athulu pirisak madakalapuwedi ada (1) udasana sanketha upawasayak aarambha kalaha.
